<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>inactive</active> <available_version>1.0.1</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.snc.iam" name="Incident Alert Management" version="1.0.1" type="application" state="published" help="Incident_Alert_Management" provider_name="ServiceNow" after_install_or_upgrade="activate_notify_functionality.js" licensable="true">
<description>Incident Alert Management allows crisis managers to manage communications for major issues, to bring together all involved users via SMS, conference calls, email subscriptions, and live feed.</description>
<requires> <import plugin="com.snc.contact_management"/> <import plugin="com.glideapp.live_feed_document"/> <import plugin="com.glide.phone_number"/> </requires>
</plugin> ]]></definition> <description>Incident Alert Management allows crisis managers to manage communications for major issues, to bring together all involved users via SMS, conference calls, email subscriptions, and live feed.</description> <has_demo_data>true</has_demo_data> <help>http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=Incident_Alert_Management</help> <id>com.snc.iam</id> <licensable>true</licensable> <name>Incident Alert Management</name> <path>plugin://com.snc.iam/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.snc.contact_management,com.glideapp.live_feed_document,com.glide.phone_number</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.snc.iam</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_updated_on> <trackable>true</trackable> <type>application</type> <version>1.0.1</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
